  • Constructor Details

    • Database

      public Database()

  • Method Details

    • RESET

      public static void RESET()
      Resets the table, deleting all the data. THIS IS NOT REVERSABLE, ALL INPUTTED DATA WILL BE DELETED.

    • addUser

      public static boolean addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the database
      Parameters:
      user - the user to be added as a User object
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • addUser

      public static boolean addUser(String username, String hashedPassword, String profilePicFilename)
      Adds a new user to the database
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to be added, must not be an existing username. Maximum of 50 characters.
      hashedPassword - the hashed password of the user to be added. Maximum of 50 characters.
      profilePicFilename - the filename of the user's profile picture. Maximum of 50 characters.
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • addReview

      public static boolean addReview(Review review)
      Adds a new review to the database. Also updates the reviewed dish's star count.
      Parameters:
      review - the review to be added as a Review object
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • addReview

      public static boolean addReview(String authorUsername, String dishName, String reviewText, String pictureFilename, int starRating)
      Adds a new review to the database. Also updates the reviewed dish's star count.
      Parameters:
      authorUsername - the username of the author of the review to be added. The username must be of a user already added to the database.
      dishName - the name of the dish of the review to be added. The dish name must be of a dish already added to the database.
      reviewText - the text of the review to be added. Maximum of 2000 characters.
      pictureFilename - the filename of the review's picture. Maximum of 50 characters.
      starRating - the number of stars given by the review
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • addDish

      public static boolean addDish(Dish dish)
      Adds a new dish to the database
      Parameters:
      dish - the dish to be added as a Dish object
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • addDish

      public static boolean addDish(String dishName, Vector<String> allergens, boolean isVegan, boolean isVegetarian, String diningHall)
      Adds a new dish to the database
      Parameters:
      dishName - the name of the dish to be added
      allergens - a vector containing the names of each of the allergens of the dish to be added
      isVegan - whether or not the dish to be added is vegan
      isVegetarian - whether or not the dish to be added is vegetarian
      diningHall - which dining hall the dish is located in. This string must be equal to "McCarthy", "Parkside", or "EVK".
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • addChatroomMessage

      public static boolean addChatroomMessage(ChatroomMessage message)
      Adds a new chatroom message to the database
      Parameters:
      message - the chatroom message to be added as a ChatroomMessage object
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • addChatroomMessage

      public static boolean addChatroomMessage(String senderUsername, String chatroomName, String messageText)
      Adds a new chatroom message to the database
      Parameters:
      senderUsername - the username of the sender. The username must be of a user already added to the database.
      chatroomName - the name of the chatroom the message is being sent to. This string must be equal to "McCarthy", "Parkside", or "EVK"
      messageText - the text of the message. Maximum of 500 characters.
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • addDirectMessage

      public static boolean addDirectMessage(DirectMessage message)
      Adds a new direct message to the database
      Parameters:
      message - the direct message to be added as a DirectMessage object
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • addDirectMessage

      public static boolean addDirectMessage(String senderUsername, String recipientUsername, String messageText)
      Adds a new direct message to the database
      Parameters:
      senderUsername - the username of the sender. The username must be of a user already added to the database.
      recipientUsername - the recipient of the sender. The username must be of a user already added to the database.
      messageText - the text of the message. Maximum of 500 characters.
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

    • getUser

      public static User getUser(String username)
      Gets the User object from a username
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the desired user
      Returns:
      the user if contained in the database, null if not

    • getDish

      public static Dish getDish(String dishname)
      Gets the Dish object from the name of the dish
      Parameters:
      dishname - the dishname of the desired dish
      Returns:
      the dish if contained in the database, null if not

    • mcCarthyDishes

      public static Vector<Dish> mcCarthyDishes()
      Gets all dishes assigned to the McCarthy dining hall
      Returns:
      a vector containing a Dish for each dish in the McCarthy dining hall sorted from oldest to newest by date of posting

    • parksideDishes

      public static Vector<Dish> parksideDishes()
      Gets all dishes assigned to the Parkside dining hall
      Returns:
      a vector containing a Dish for each dish in the Parkside dining hall sorted from oldest to newest by date of posting

    • evkDishes

      public static Vector<Dish> evkDishes()
      Gets all dishes assigned to the EVK dining hall
      Returns:
      a vector containing a Dish for each dish in the EVK dining hall sorted from oldest to newest by date of posting

    • allReviewsOfDish

      public static Vector<Review> allReviewsOfDish(String dishName)
      Gets all the reviews written about a given dish
      Parameters:
      dishName - the name of the desired dish
      Returns:
      a vector containing a Review object for each review of that dish sorted from oldest to newest by date of posting, null if that dish does not exist

    • mcCarthyMessages

      public static Vector<ChatroomMessage> mcCarthyMessages()
      Gets all chats in the McCarthy dining hall chatroom
      Returns:
      a vector containing a ChatroomMessage object for each chat in the McCarthy chatroom sorted from oldest to newest

    • parksideMessages

      public static Vector<ChatroomMessage> parksideMessages()
      Gets all chats in the Parkside dining hall chatroom
      Returns:
      a vector containing a ChatroomMessage object for each chat in the Parkside chatroom sorted from oldest to newest

    • evkMessages

      public static Vector<ChatroomMessage> evkMessages()
      Gets all chats in the EVK dining hall chatroom
      Returns:
      a vector containing a ChatroomMessage object for each chat in the EVK chatroom sorted from oldest to newest

    • directMessagesFromUser

      public static Vector<DirectMessage> directMessagesFromUser(String username)
      Gets all chats sent by a specific user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the sender of the messages to be returned
      Returns:
      a vector containing all messages sent by the passed user sorted from oldest to newest, null if that username is not in the database

    • directMessagesToUser

      public static Vector<DirectMessage> directMessagesToUser(String username)
      Gets all chats sent to a specific user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the recipient of the messages to be returned
      Returns:
      a vector containing all messages sent to the passed user sorted from oldest to newest, null if that username is not in the database

    • directMessagesInvolvingUser

      public static Vector<DirectMessage> directMessagesInvolvingUser(String username)
      Gets all chats sent to or received by a specific user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the sender or recipient of the messages to be returned
      Returns:
      a vector containing all messages sent to or recieved by to the passed user sorted from oldest to newest, null if that username is not in the database

    • totalNumUsers

      public int totalNumUsers()
      Gets the total number of users in the database
      Returns:
      how many users have been added to the database

    • updateLocation

      public boolean updateLocation(String username, String location)
      Updates (or sets if this is the first time this is called for this user) a user's location in the database Note: after you update the location you MUST call getUser() again in order to have a user object with the updated location
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to be updated
      location - the new location of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user was found and location was updated, false if not
